resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106627</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106627</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205947</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">EDSITEment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EDSITEment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">EDSITEment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EDSITEment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">EDSITEment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">EDSITEment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">EDSITEment</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers subject-based access to top humanities sites, EDSITEment lesson plans, and at-home activities. Subject areas include literature and language arts, foreign languages, art and culture, and history and social studies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet subjektbasierten Zugriff zu den oberen 
Menschlichkeitsite-, EDSITEment Lektionplänen und zu den at-home 
Aktivitäten an. Bereiche schließen Literatur- und 
Sprachenkünste, Fremdsprachen, kunst und Kultur und die Geschichten- 
und Sozialstudien ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre l'accès spécialisé par domaine aux plans 
supérieurs de sites de sciences humaines, de leçon d'EDSITEment, et 
aux activités domestiques. Les domaines incluent des arts de 
littérature et de langage, des langues étrangères, l'art et la 
culture, et des études d'histoire et sociales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece acesso subject-based às plantas 
superiores dos locais dos humanities, da lição de EDSITEment, e às 
atividades at-home. As áreas sujeitas incluem artes da 
literatura e da língua, línguas extrangeiras, arte e cultura, e os 
estudos do history e os sociais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre l'accesso basato sul tema ai programmi 
superiori dei luoghi di studi umanistici, di lezione di EDSITEment ed 
alle attività di casa. I settori includono le arti di 
linguaggio e della letteratura, le lingue straniere, l'arte e la 
coltura e gli studi sociali e di storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει την ειδικευμένη κατά τομέα πρόσβαση στις 
κορυφαίες περιοχές ανθρωποτήτων, τα σχέδια μαθήματος 
EDSITEment, και τις σπιτικές δραστηριότητες. Οι θεματικές 
περιοχές περιλαμβάνουν τις τέχνες λογοτεχνίας και γλώσσας, τις 
ξένες γλώσσες, την τέχνη και τον πολιτισμό, και τις κοινωνικών 
μελέτες ιστορίας και.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece el acceso basado sobre el tema a los planes
superiores de los sitios de la humanidad, de la lección de 
EDSITEment, y a las actividades at-home. Los temas incluyen 
artes de la literatura y del lenguaje, idiomas extranjeros, arte y la 
cultura, y los estudios del historia y sociales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205947</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106627</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/edsitement</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
